plot: The travails of Mack and Addy, separated from the group.

Mack and Addy continue their westward travel on motorcycle, hoping to reunite with the group in a few days. There relationship becomes more tense, as it is apparent Addy is disturbed by unclear flashbacks, and she is reluctant to share them with Mack. After a discussion about how they never had a "first date", Mack goes off to prepare an impromptu date night, and returns to a sleeping Addy. As Mack nods off, he is trapped in a recurring nightmare, and continuously reawakens, only to discover he is in the same recurring nightmare.—jtighe-6

In Utah, Mack and Addy expect to join the rest of the group and they stop by a creek. Addy is tense and disturbed by her daydreams and Mack tries to please her with their first date having dinner together using a few supplies. However Addy sleeps and he decides to rest. But soon he finds that he is trapped in a nightmare with a huge zombie.—Claudio Carvalho, Rio de Janeiro, Brazil
